original_text: “Son of man, set your face against Pharaoh king of Egypt, and prophesy against him and against all Egypt;
korean_text: 인자야 너는 애굽의 바로 왕과 온 애굽으로 얼굴을 향하고 예언하라

sentences.original_text: set your face against Pharaoh king of Egypt,
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 얼굴을 애굽 왕 바로에게 향하게 하고,

sentences.original_text: and prophesy against him and against all Egypt;
